overview:
Director/Deputy Director with extensive and diversified experience in: healthcare operations; strategic planning/ fundraising/ budgetary management, feasibility and needs assessment.

Strong skill set in quantitative and qualitative analysis; curriculum development; teaching and training of healthcare workers; and process improvement in the healthcare industry and academic medical training settings. Strong closer in finalizing large multi-year foundation or federal grants, and strong leadership in start up environments.

Outstanding and well regarded mentor to recent and near recent college graduates, including overseas graduates with interests in development, Web 2.0, or healthcare, public health and medicine careers.

Has used recent period of underemployment after State of CA layoffs to develop facility in Middle East and Central Asian languages, Arabic and Farsi, and colloquial Egyptian. Interested in international healthcare and development assignments in the Middle East, particularly North Africa and in East Africa.
